department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Born and raised on Chicago's Southside. Graduated St. Christina Elementary School and Queen of Peace High School. Earned a B.S.C. in Accountancy from DePaul University, a Computer Career Program Certificate from DePaul University and an M.S. in Computer Science from Illinois Institute of Technology. Took advanced mathematics classes at Northern Illinois University for fun. Employed by Florsheim Shoe Company as a financial analyst, TransUnion Credit Information Company as a programmer, Illinois Institute of Technology as an instructor, ATT-Bell Labs as a systems performance analyst and database programmer, and Cayenne Digital as the owner/developer/web designer. Have lived in several areas across the U.S. including Fargo, North Dakota! Have seen much of the world including our beautiful country, China, Japan, Great Britain and several spots in Europe.
